alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 06 at 7:33PM EST until February 10 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama...Florida... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...Until Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 17 feet, Considerable flooding of lowlands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:05 PM CST Sunday the stage was 17.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 18 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 17 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
